title: Did Harley Davidson shut down Wisconsin's factory to move production to Thailand because of new steel tariffs?
subtitle: The Ionic motorcycle manufacturer announced that it would open a factory in Thailand about a year before President Donald Trump imposed tariffs on steel imports.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: In March 2018, Harley Davidson announced that they would close down a factory in Wisconsin and transfer all manufacturing to Thailand in response to President Donald Trump's announced steel tariffs.
